channel.title: State Capitol on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in State Capitol on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-15 South - Helena Distance
item.description: I-15 South - Helena State Capitol distance. A similar sign is posted on I-15 leaving Butte.

item.title: US-50 West - Entering Carson City
item.description: US-50 west at the Lyon County - Carson City line. When entering all other counties in Nevada, the county name is above the words County Line. In Carson City, the County Line is replaced with State Capitol.
